column2: "/ci2 2 With Leader's help, we can beat any enemy! I'll do my best too!"
"/ci2 1 Ehehe, I got praised! Thanks for your help, Leader. Let's do it again some time!"

"Coming, sis! Don't push yourself too hard, Leader...
Let's get something to eat later, OK?"
"Ugh... I don't think I can keep going. Over to you, sis..."
"Are you alright, sis?! Don't push yourself if you're too damaged to fight!"
